I&#39;m halfway through typing up the Actual Play from my most recent <b>Dungeon World</b> convention game. I borrowed from <span class="proflinkWrapper"><span class="proflinkPrefix">+</span><a class="proflink" href="https://plus.google.com/103619294696451727396" oid="103619294696451727396">Joe Banner</a></span>&#39;s <i>Bellicorn of Oldthorn</i> and subconsciously from a certain room in <i>Fortress of the Ur-Mage</i> to make a four/five-room dungeon crawl. It was a nice game, and I&#39;ll probably post a link to the transcript if anyone&#39;s up for reading an overly-descriptive ramble. We&#39;ve even got minor deities inspired by misheard lyrics!<br /><br />Thanks for the inspiration, Joe, Davy &amp; Maynard!
